area: Cape Wrath to Rattray Head including Orkney (1)

forecast.wind: Easterly 4 to 6 veering southwesterly 3 to 5, then northwesterly 4 to 6 later, occasionally 7 later in north.
forecast.sea: Slight or moderate, occasionally rough until later in north.
forecast.weather: Rain or drizzle, with fog patches at first, showers later.
forecast.visibility: Moderate or good, occasionally very poor at first.
